title: San Diego/Downtown
name: Maritime Museum of San Diego
price: $16 adults, $13 seniors/military/students, $8 children, free for children under 4 (''packages which include sailing excursions are available'')
content: Home to a number of historic sea vessels, including the ''Star of India'', the world's oldest active sailing ship, the ''Berkeley'', an 1898 steam ferryboat, the ''Californian'', a replica sailing ship, the ''Medea'', a 1904 steam yacht, the ''HMS Surprise'', another replica sailing ship, and a B-39 Soviet Attack Submarine.
